item.title: Instrumenting applications with Prometheus
item.description: “What is not defined cannot be measured. What is not measured, cannot be improved. What is not improved, is always degraded”. William Thomson Kelvin In this article, we will learn how to create custom metrics for a simple web application and use Prometheus to collect and report on them. Site Reliability Engineering ðŸ”—This post is part of a series about Site Reliability Engineering (SRE). In the series, we will talk about different concepts,Â tools, and techniques to keep a large-scale system healthy.
